amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Small Business Administration by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for Selective Service System by $10,000,000 and increase funds for the Small Business Administration by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 95 - 320 (Roll no. 585).
